channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today
channel.desc: Join Greg and Jill Morikone, along with special guests from the 3ABN Radio team, for an inspiring program celebrating God's faithfulness. Hear powerful stories of how God brought this team together and how He has worked through 3ABN Radio to impact lives for 25 years. Don't miss this journey of faith, miracles, and ministry!
